name: Bryn

Sneak Attack.description: Deal an extra 1d6 damage to one creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll.

Thieves' Cant.description: You can speak in a secret mix of dialect, jargon, and code that allows you to hide messages in seemingly normal conversation.

ability_score_increase.description: Your ability scores each increase by 1.

languages: One extra language of your choice
equipment: A trophy from an animal you killed
